title: dV Giochi Bang! The Gold Rush | Card Game (9103DVG)
features: BANG! Gold Rush is an expansion for BANG!, the famous western card game that has sold over two million copies worldwide; To play, you must have the base game, BANG!
The box includes a cascade of gold nuggets - the reward for the most skilled gunslinger.
You start the game with no equipment and no gold nuggets; Will you be skilled enough to earn them with your own hands?
Damage your opponents and equip yourself with powerful new weapons to make your way through the gold rush.
Pay attention to the ruthless shadow gunslingers; they have only one purpose: to knock you out!
